APP.caption: Contract Chain
APP.doc: Chain that the NFT smart contract is deployed on. Choices: Ethereum, Rinkeby, Polygon, Mumbai.
APP.name: contract_chain

APR.caption: Color Scheme
APR.doc: The accent color for the checkout (buttons and links). Valid values: gray, red, orange, yellow, green, teal, blue, cyan, purple, pink
APR.name: color_scheme

APb.caption: Seller Twitter Handle
APb.doc: Override the seller's Twitter handle for this checkout.
APb.name: seller_twitter_handle

APc.caption: Collection Image URL
APc.doc: An image preview on the checkout. Supports .gif, .jpeg, and .png up to 10MB. Make sure it starts with https://
APc.name: image_url

APd.caption: Collection Name
APd.doc: The name of the NFT collection.
APd.name: collection_name

APe.caption: Collection Description
APe.doc: Optional: A description of the NFT collection.
APe.name: collection_description

APf.caption: Contract Address
APf.doc: The smart contract address of the NFTs being sold.  Example: 0x51bc2de5181a1964ad65669cf25ba0e97b8a84bf
APf.name: contract_address

APh.caption: Cancel URL
APh.doc: The URL that buyers will be redirected if they are unable to complete this purchase, such as using an expired one-time purchase links
APh.name: cancel_url

APi.caption: Success URL
APi.doc: The URL that buyers will be directed after a successful checkout.
APi.name: success_url

APj.caption: Limit Per Transaction
APj.doc: Set the max quantity allowed per purchase. Note: A buyer is still able to make multiple purchases. Defaults to 5.
APj.name: limit_per_transaction

AQl.caption: API Key Required,  Please visit Paper.xyz to sign up and receive an API key.
AQl.name: info
